artist: Delineator: Giovanni Domenico Campiglia; Engraver: Pietro Antonio Pazzi
description: half length portrait of man turned left and looking our at viewer; wearing cloak and white shirt with high collar and long cuffs; gesturing with PR hand toward four brushes at lower right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: GIO. GUISEPPI DAL SOLE / PITTORE / Gio. Dom. Campiglia del.  P.A. Pazzi fe.  | in pencil on sheet: 2-413
title: Portrait of Giovanni Guiseppi dal Sole
